subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Women and Girls
Politics and Government
Muslims and Islam
lead_paragraph: A Saudi Arabian newspaper, Al-Watan, reported that Saudi Olympic Committee President Prince Nawaf bin Faisal does not approve of the country’s sending female athletes to the Olympics for the first time.
snippet: A Saudi Arabian newspaper, Al-Watan, reported that Saudi Olympic Committee President Prince Nawaf bin Faisal does not approve of the country’s sending female athletes to the Olympics for the first time.
